articles.description: IPL 2022: Even off the field, Suresh Raina would never shy away from backing a promising or young talent, an example of which has been shared by Sunrisers Hyderabad's 21-year-old youngster.
articles.content: Suresh Raina was the perfect team man. Before Virat Kohli or MS Dhoni, it was Raina who instilled energy into the Indian team by walking up to every bowler after every ball, or motivating the other f… [+3006 chars]
